function NPC_501000:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: Pain누적 데미지 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 1);
NPC_501000.LimitForPain = NPC_501000.MaxHP/10
NPC_501000.BuffIdDoubt = 40701
NPC_501000.TalIdApocalypseCasting = 250100016 NPC_501000.TalIdApocalypse = 250100017 NPC_501000.TalIdGroundOfDeath = 250100018
NPC_501000.TalIdPain1 = 250100003 NPC_501000.TalIdPain2 = 250100004 NPC_501000.TalIdPain3 = 250100005
end
-- 종말의예언:사명감 걸어주기. function NPC_501000:OnStartProphecy( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Target = AsNPC(ThisNPC):Aggro("far", 0) if not Target then return end Target:GainBuff( NPC_501000.BuffIdDoubt ) end
function NPC_501000:ProcessAccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog("NPC_501000:ProcessAccDamage") local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent()
-- 종말의예언 캔슬 처리 if currentTalent == NPC_501000.TalIdApocalypse then ThisNPC:ClearJob() if ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501000.TalIdPain3 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501000.TalIdPain1 ) end
return end
-- pain 패턴 local PAIN = 1 local damageAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( PAIN ) + HitInfo.Damage if damageAcc > NPC_501000.LimitForPain and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) and not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain2 ) and currentTalent ~= NPC_501000.TalIdApocalypseCasting and currentTalent ~= NPC_501000.TalIdApocalypse and currentTalent ~= NPC_501000.TalIdGroundOfDeath then
ThisNPC:SetUserData( PAIN, 0 ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501000.TalIdPain2 ) return end --if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_117000.TalIdPain2 ) then -- AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow("$$COLT_0501000_117") --end ThisNPC:SetUserData( PAIN, damageAcc ) end
function NPC_501000:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) -- GLog("NPC_501000:OnHitCapsule_1_0") NPC_501000:ProcessAccDamage( this, 0, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_501000:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) -- GLog("NPC_501000:OnHitCapsule_1_0") NPC_501000:ProcessAccDamage( this, 0, HitInfo ) end
